WorkItem.Description:
VS has problems correctly typing _ symbol when using [underscore.d.ts](https://github.com/borisyankov/DefinitelyTyped/blob/39c52483369ccab79874b08c3f69397245dad3d9/underscore/underscore.d.ts).

Given this code:
```
_([]).map(x => x);
```
VS complains:
> Cannot invoke an expression whose type lacks a call signature.

But the code compiles fine.

Also, looking into underscore.d.ts there are red squiggles under function _() declarations and it seems that VS considers them to conflict with module of the same name.

VS2012, TS0.9.1.1
WorkItem.Summary: Visual Studio has problems with underscore type definition
